text: Kelly Ripa ’ s announcement that Ryan Seacrest will be the new co - host of “ Live with Kelly ” on Monday lifted the syndicated daytime talk show to strong ratings. According to Nielsen data, “ Live with Kelly and Ryan, ” as it will now be known, delivered a 3. 1 household rating, the show ’ s best delivery in that measurement since its post - Oscar show in February. It also drew a 1. 3 rating in women 25 - 54. The numbers were good enough to make the show the number one syndicated talk show on Monday in both measurements, topping “ Dr. Phil ” and “ Ellen. ” Ripa and Seacrest announced the surprise choice at the start of Monday ’ s edition of the show, which Ripa has hosted since early 2001.
